channel.title: 2023 Trip to Seoul on 咪卡咔
channel.description: Recent content in 2023 Trip to Seoul on 咪卡咔

item.title: [Korea] Switch a Shinhan Bank account from ARC number to passport number
item.description: I never thought it would take me over 9 years to return to Seoul after leaving in 2014. My Shinhan Bank account has been frozen for a while. To check if it is still usable, I brought my passbook with me to Seoul!
